Map<String, String> stageStatusMap = new Map<String, String>();
List<String> tempList = new List<String>{'Customer Status','Customer Stage'};
for(JBCXM__Picklist__c pkList : [SELECT Id, JBCXM__SystemName__c FROM
                                 JBCXM__PickList__c Where JBCXM__Category__c IN :tempList ]) {
    stageStatusMap.put(pkList.JBCXM__SystemName__c, pkList.Id);
}
delete [select id from Case];
delete [select id from contact];
Delete [SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Name Like 'Account for related list%'];
List<Account> accList1 = new List<Account>();
for(Integer i=0; i<=1; i++) {
    Account acc1 = new Account(Name='Account for related list' +i);
    accList1.add(acc1);
}
insert accList1;
List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c> custList = new List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c>();
for(Account acc2 : accList1) {
   JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c cust = new JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c(JBCXM__Account__c = acc2.Id,
                                        JBCXM__Status__c = stageStatusMap.get('ActiveCustomer'),
                                        JBCXM__Stage__c = stageStatusMap.get('stage1'));
    custList.add(cust);
}
insert custList;

List<Account> a = [select Id, Name from Account WHERE NAME = 'Account for related list1'];

delete [SELECT id, name FROM sfdcrelatedlist__c where Name IN ('test1', 'test2', 'test3')];

sfdcrelatedlist__c record1 = new sfdcrelatedlist__c(Name='test1',AccPercentage__c=2,ActiveUsers__c=3,CurrencyField__c=100,FNumber__c=30,IsActive__c=true,lookupfieldname__c=a[0].id);
insert record1;
sfdcrelatedlist__c record2 = new sfdcrelatedlist__c(Name='test2',AccPercentage__c=3,ActiveUsers__c=5,CurrencyField__c=200,FNumber__c=30,IsActive__c=true,lookupfieldname__c=a[0].id);
insert record2;
sfdcrelatedlist__c record3 = new sfdcrelatedlist__c(Name='test3',AccPercentage__c=4,ActiveUsers__c=6,CurrencyField__c=300,FNumber__c=30,IsActive__c=true,lookupfieldname__c=a[0].id);
insert record3;

Contact contactrec1 = new Contact(AccountId=a[0].id,email='test@user.com',FirstName='test',LastName='user');
insert contactrec1;
Contact contactrec2 = new Contact(AccountId=a[0].id,email='test@user2.com',FirstName='test',LastName='user2');
insert contactrec2;
  
List<Contact> c = [select Id from Contact WHERE LastName = 'user'];
List<Contact> c1 = [select Id from Contact WHERE LastName = 'user2'];

  
Case caserec1 = new Case(AccountId=a[0].id,ContactId=c[0].id,Origin='Email',Priority='Medium',Status='New');
insert caserec1;
Case caserec2 = new Case(AccountId=a[0].id,ContactId=c1[0].id,Origin='Phone',Priority='High',Status='Escalated');
insert caserec2;

Delete[Select id from JBCXM__C360Sections__c where JBCXM__Type__c ='RelatedList'];
Delete[Select id from JBCXM__C360Sections__c where JBCXM__Type__c ='ExternalReport'];
